Package game

Class HarvestBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.HarvestBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behaviour
    public class HarvestBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behaviour
    A subclass of Behaviour that represents the fertilising of crops, will return a new HarvestAction if a farmer is standing on or next to a ripe crop, if there are multiple ripe crops available for harvest, a random crop will be chosen to be harvested.
    Author:
    Tan Song Shun

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        public Action getAction​(Actor actor,
                        GameMap map)
        Description copied from interface: Behaviour
        A factory for creating actions. A Behaviour represents a kind of objective that an Actor can have. For example it might want to seek out a particular kind of object, or follow another Actor, or run away and hide. Each implementation of Behaviour returns an Action that the Actor could take to achieve its objective, or null if no useful options are available. An Actor's playTurn() method can use Behaviours to help decide which Action to perform next. It can also simply create Actions itself, but using Behaviours allows us to modularize the code that decides what to do, and that means that it can be reused if (e.g.) more than one kind of Actor needs to be able to seek, follow, or hide.
        Specified by:
        getAction in interface Behaviour
        Parameters:
        actor - the Actor acting
        map - the GameMap containing the Actor
        Returns:
        an Action that actor can perform, or null if actor can't do this.

      • checkCrop

        public java.util.ArrayList<Action> checkCrop​(Actor actor,
                                             GameMap map,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<Action> actions)
        This method checks for the available ripe crops to be harvested and returns an ArrayList of Action so that getAction can choose from the available HarvestAction
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor that is harvesting the crop.
        map - The game map the actor is in.
        actions - An ArrayList of Action that stores the HarvestAction.
        Returns:
        actions An ArrayList that represents the HarvestAction that can be carried out
